title: Brexit news latest: Angela Merkel tells Boris Johnson that deal is 'overwhelmingly unlikely'
text:
Angela Merkel has told Boris Johnson that a Brexit deal is "overwhelmingly unlikely" unless Northern Ireland stays in the Customs Union.

It is the clearest sign yet that talks are breaking down and a deal won't be agreed ahead of the current October 31 deadline.

Following a morning phone call between the German chancellor and Prime Minister, a Downing Street source said: "If this represents a new established position, then it means a deal is essentially impossible not just now - but ever."

"It also made clear that they [European leaders] are willing to torpedo the Good Friday Agreement."

It comes after Mr Johnson proposed a revised Brexit blueprint last week, presented as a "fair and reasonable compromise" on the Irish border issue.

More follows…
